family.name: Emperor Jimmu
family.description: Emperor Jimmu was the first Emperor of Japan. He is a legendary figure and his existence is debated by historians.

family.name: Emperor Meiji
family.description: Emperor Meiji was the 122nd Emperor of Japan. He presided over a time of rapid modernization and westernization of Japan.

family.name: Emperor Hirohito
family.description: Emperor Hirohito was the 124th Emperor of Japan. He reigned during World War II and the post-war period.

family.name: Emperor Akihito
family.description: Emperor Akihito is the 125th Emperor of Japan. He reigned from 1989 to 2019, when he abdicated the throne.
